## Loader interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Loader<T extends LoaderContext>
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [context](./hls.js.loader.context.md) |  | T |  |
|  [getCacheAge?](./hls.js.loader.getcacheage.md) |  | () =&gt; number \| null | <p><i>(Optional)</i> <code>getCacheAge()</code> is called by hls.js to get the duration that a given object has been sitting in a cache proxy when playing live. If implemented, this should return a value in seconds.</p><p>For HTTP based loaders, this should return the contents of the "age" header.</p> |
